title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Whisk eggs with parmesan, salt, and pepper.
Combine pasta with pancetta, then quickly mix in egg mixture.
